articles.content:
The first verdicts on the long-awaited Top Gun sequel Top Gun: Maverick are in and fans have reason to be excited.

articles.author: Emma Crabtree
articles.title: Princess Beatrice enjoys night away from 'screaming baby' to honour the Queen - Express
articles.description: PRINCESS BEATRICE and her husband Edoardo Mapelli Mozzi attended a preview of ‘A Gallop Through History' on Wednesday night in a rare night out since the birth of their daughter.

articles.title: Kelly Osbourne 'over the moon' as she announces she's expecting first child - Sky News
articles.content:
Kelly Osbourne has announced she is pregnant with her first child.
